subject: Plug and play? Pro X Ultra-P3-H3
description_text:
Hello does this pedal setup come with everything needed to plug it up to my PC, calibrate and race? Cables to plug it up?  Extra springs and such?  I know it doesn’t have a base plate and that’s fine.   James

Be Cool!

conversations.body_text: Hello, it includes all necessary accessories and will also include the spring shown in the image. If you require a base plate, this can be ordered separately. The checkout price is the final price, with no additional taxes or fees. You may also apply this $20 store promotion discount: FFLV20  https://www.simsonn.com/products/simsonn-racing-sim-pedal-pro-x-ultra
